price: 17 ne goûtant au sommeil qu’une petite partie de la nuit,
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
